segments.text: I notice the scent of cookies may be wafting through the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined; it’s endearing to see him go after that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the way he balances on that stool gives me a knot in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His feet look like they could slip at any moment, and that’s just terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would pay attention to what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so content in her dishwashing routine, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen if the boy falls? Will he hurt himself?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, but that joy is overshadowed by my fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cookies just out of her reach; it’s almost cruel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels like a ticking time bomb, waiting for the inevitable disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
